sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from 'src/app/services/api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-my-rides', templateUrl: './my-rides.component.html', styleUrls: ['./my-rides.component.scss'] }) export class MyRidesComponent implements OnInit { profileOrders:any; user = localStorage.getItem('userId'); userId:number = (this.user==null)?0:parseInt(this.user); constructor(private service:ApiService) { this.service.getProfileOrders(this.userId).subscribe(data=>{ this.profileOrders=data; console.log(this.profileOrders); }) } ngOnInit(): void { } }
